text: Neubrandenburg ( or shortened: Bramborg) (New Brandenburg, ) is a city in Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania, Germany. It is in the southeastern part of the state, at the shore of a lake called the Tollensesee. The city was founded in the year 1248. Till September 4, 2011 Neubrandenburg was a urban district. Since March 2015 Silvio Witt is the mayor of Neubrandenburg. He is the succesor of Paul Kr√ºger (CDU). Neubrandenburg was founded by the knight Herbord von Raven in the year 1248. ==References== == Other websites == *Official site (German, English)
title: Neubrandenburg
